thread.title: Creatures stirring: Bakersfield enjoys quiet day after Christmas | News | bakersfield.com
thread.title_full: Creatures stirring: Bakersfield enjoys quiet day after Christmas | News | bakersfield.com

author: PETER SEGALL psegall@bakersfield.com
title: Creatures stirring: Bakersfield enjoys quiet day after Christmas | News | bakersfield.com
text:
The day after Christmas was quiet around Bakersfield as families with the day off headed out to take advantage of the sun and the extended vacation.
It was uncharacteristically busy Thursday morning at the Park at River Walk, but with kids still out of school and many parents taking time away from work, dozens of people walked, biked, fished or simply laid out in the sun after a busy Christmas Day.
